content.rendered:
Photo via Unsplash

This Week in Genesis there’s two new premium themes, more inspiration in the showcase, and tutorials for your next project. All you have to do is read!

Themes

Seo Themes continue their prodigous output with the launch their latest, Restaurant Pro.

Say hello to Restaurant Pro https://t.co/kz7iujwtop A full-featured Genesis child theme for restaurants. #genesiswp #WordPress pic.twitter.com/WSGQM6jvkj

— Seo Themes (@seothemeswp) March 15, 2017

And they’re looking for suggestions for their next theme, which will be free.

Our next theme will be a Genesis freebie. Any suggestions/requests? #genesiswp #WordPreds

— Seo Themes (@seothemeswp) March 18, 2017

Bharat Mandava launches Kreativ Pro, a new porfolio / agency theme with WooCommerce support on Genesis.

Meet Kreativ Pro, a portfolio & agency #WordPress #genesiswp child theme with #WooCommerce support is now available https://t.co/GaTObxYidk pic.twitter.com/wdx1WPBzcu

— Bharat Mandava (@_mandava) March 17, 2017

Showcase

New site for Avoca Design on Genesis and Beaver Builder, with help from Kirsten Revell, avoca.design

Introducing our new website and branding – https://t.co/vXcqNFQTQE – Wahoo!

With help from #genesiswp @beaverbuilder @kirstenrevell

— Avoca Design (@avocawebdesign) March 12, 2017

Chris Wathen for rehabilitationperformance.com

New #WordPress website built with #genesiswp. https://t.co/jpN6pyn892 pic.twitter.com/fYklEJJrn0

— Chris Wathen (@webguychris) March 15, 2017

George Illdis relaunches is personal website on Genesis, ilidisg.com

Just launched my brand new personal website! I'd love to hear your thoughts! Built on Genesis. https://t.co/XncoMgK64d #genesiswp

— George Ilidis (@georgeilidis) March 16, 2017

Lisa Wood for paintedtulipvt.com

Thrilled to launch a gorgeous new design for @paintedtulip! Built on #genesiswp #wordpress https://t.co/CMrhB6IGFJ

— Lisa Wood (@lisawood) March 19, 2017

Best of the rest

Brian Gardner took your questions on StudioPress Live and you catch the replays of all recent episodes via studiopress.blog/live.

Join @bgardner today at 1:00 CST for StudioPress Live on Facebook. — https://t.co/orgsCqsQAU #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/59L9GcfgJz

— StudioPress (@studiopress) March 16, 2017

Sridhar Katakam shows you how to set up a SVG logo in Genesis.

How to set up SVG logo in Genesis:https://t.co/g7JXHzGQnk#GenesisWP

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) March 15, 2017

Tim Jensen with a clean way to add hooks between Genesis structural wraps and their parent containers.

A clean way to add hooks between Genesis structural wraps and their parent containers. #genesiswp https://t.co/pB9igcO2bA

— Tim Jensen (@timothy_jensen_) March 14, 2017

Robin Cornett on modifying Genesis Framework archives to accept (Gravity Forms) shortcodes (h/t Marcy Diaz).

Modify Genesis Framework Archives to Accept (Gravity Forms) Shortcodes https://t.co/6R1VOU6SLr Nice tut for #GenesisWP from @robincornett pic.twitter.com/omWfGbLkvo

— Marcy Diaz (@mjsdiaz1) March 16, 2017

Susan Ramsey on how to update your WordPress admin toolbar text colour.

Another tutorial in my #Genesis4Beginners series – updating the admin toolbar text color: https://t.co/ndRBJ75zM1 … #GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/DI3lfcEdty

— Susan Ramsey (@onehappystudio) March 13, 2017

Cami MacNamara is featured on the GoDaddy blog.

Thank you @andymci and @godaddy for this great article. #genesiswp & @studiopress get a big shout out, too! https://t.co/xziNkbrUsy

— Cami MacNamara (@webcami) March 13, 2017

Big shout to all those that made it to WordCamp London and the Genesis meetup this weekend.

UK #genesiswp meet up pic.twitter.com/06UQsRYwWI

— UK Genesis (@UKGenesis) March 18, 2017

U.K. #genesiswp meet up at #wcldn – find @PurpleHippoUk wearing her t-shirt. Table near the bar 🙂 pic.twitter.com/VhUd73jymr

— UK Genesis (@UKGenesis) March 18, 2017

And hope you all enjoy Day 2.

Looking forward to #wcldn day 2. Hats off to all the organisers, speakers, volunteers and sponsors. Thank you.

— Jo Waltham (@JoWaltham) March 19, 2017

Jeffrey Carandang updates his Genesis Simple Love plugin (hadn’t seen this one before).

And finally…

Lauren Mancke’s got two little pieces of inspiration for her next Genesis theme.

These @studiopress babies are ready to build some new themes #girlswhocode #8weeksold #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/c9BskJqUyI

— Lauren Mancke (@laurenmancke) March 13, 2017

—

That’s all for this week.

Done something awesome? Share it! Want to hear about what other people are doing? Subscribe!

Till next time…

excerpt.rendered: Two new premium themes, more inspiration in the showcase, and tutorials for your next project.
